basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Junior Software System Engineer
basics.summary: Entry-level Software System Engineer with a Bachelor's degree in Informatics, experienced in supporting the software development lifecycle through coding in TypeScript and JavaScript, software design fundamentals, documentation, and troubleshooting. Proficient in full-stack development, AI/ML integrations, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. Committed to building technical knowledge and adhering to coding standards while contributing to innovative projects.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Contributed to software development projects by leading frontend development, engineering AI-powered solutions, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure compliance with coding standards and enhance system functionality.
highlights: Assisted in software design and analysis by leading the frontend refactoring of an exam management platform using Vue.js and Vuetify, improving user experience and page load times by approximately 25%
Supported troubleshooting and quality control by engineering and deploying AdCognition, an AI-powered browser extension using TypeScript and TensorFlow.js for real-time ad detection and blocking
Contributed to documentation and knowledge sharing through developing RoboGPT, an Nvidia Isaac Sim extension for controlling robots via natural language commands using LLMs and OpenAI APIs
Collaborated with UI/UX designers and participated in code reviews to translate mockups into functional web pages, adhering to architectural standards

work.name: Bigfoot Startup
work.summary: Supported the software development lifecycle as a core team member building the AdsMedia full-stack retargeting platform using Nuxt.js, Vue.js, and TypeScript, ensuring compliance with coding standards and facilitating smooth API integrations.
highlights: Assisted in analysis and design phases by architecting and developing key dashboard and form components for campaign management using TypeScript
Contributed to configuration and setup of frontend components, implementing responsive design and cross-browser compatibility for seamless user experience
Collaborated with backend team on system design and API integration to support data flow and application functionality, providing input on task estimation

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Provided customer support while developing automation solutions to improve efficiency, honing troubleshooting skills and interdisciplinary collaboration.
highlights: Supported software test plans and bug fixing by developing Otis, a JavaScript-based templating software using RegEx to automate form-filling and email generation, winning 1st place in company innovation contest
Built technical knowledge through hands-on programming and documentation of automation tools, enhancing team productivity

courses: Building a modern fullstack web application (Thesis)

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Awarded for developing Otis, a JavaScript-based templating software that automated form-filling and email generation, contributing to high-quality software solutions.

projects.name: AdCognition
projects.description: AI-powered browser extension for real-time ad detection and blocking, demonstrating troubleshooting skills and software design fundamentals in TypeScript.
highlights: Engineered extension using TypeScript and TensorFlow.js to support quality control and bug detection in real-time applications
Contributed to documentation and setup of AI components for seamless integration

projects.name: RoboGPT
projects.description: Nvidia Isaac Sim extension for controlling robots via natural language commands, showcasing collaboration on interdisciplinary software solutions and technical knowledge building.
highlights: Developed extension using LLMs and OpenAI APIs to assist in system support and configuration of platform components
Participated in test plan support for natural language processing features

projects.name: Otis â€“ Customer Support Automation Tool
projects.description: JavaScript-based templating software for automating form-filling and email generation, highlighting documentation skills and adherence to coding standards.
highlights: Implemented automation using JavaScript, jQuery, and RegEx to enhance efficiency and support troubleshooting efforts
Documented solution for knowledge sharing within the team

projects.name: IT-Hub - MERN Stack Social Media Web Application
projects.description: Full-stack social media application built with MERN stack, demonstrating end-to-end software development and team collaboration.
highlights: Designed dynamic frontend features using React.js and managed state with Redux for component-based architecture
Built backend with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB to support data flow and quality software solutions

projects.name: defender-bot
projects.description: Python-controlled LEGO Mindstorms robot, illustrating basic programming knowledge and OOP principles in software design.
highlights: Developed robot control system using Python and Micropython for sensor integration and system support
